#summary Install instructions

= Introduction =

This is supposed to be a complete guide how to install and use the svn-plugin


= Details =

Prerequires:

SVN - http://subversion.tigris.org/
You should be able to run:
"svnadmin --version"
and
"svn --version"




Installation:

Put domain_create_post.sh in /usr/local/directadmin/scripts/custom/
Put domain_destroy_pre.sh in /usr/local/directadmin/scripts/custom/
Put user_create_post.sh in /usr/local/directadmin/scripts/custom/

Put virtual_host2.conf in /usr/local/directadmin/data/templates/custom/
Put virtual_host2_secure.conf in /usr/local/directadmin/data/templates/custom/

Upload svn.tar.gz in directadmin-panel

Summary:
Next time you create a use tou will be ablu to surf to http://sample.com/svn/ and access your SVN with settings made in directadmin panel
